message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you halfway at $105. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $108, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $100?
